title: Give lesser played champs more skins >:(
body:
Ivern has 1 skin (Ivern main btw) I love his champion design but he gets no love on skins
Ive also noticed champs like kled, Aureien Sol, and a few others have only 1 or 2 skins but u give all these other champs like 5 skins because they are more often picked....

replies.body: The accountants and financial planners at Riot Games said no :)

I think it might be that they only want to prioritize skins they think will sell. You think that it’s a coincidence that Lucian, one of the most op adc at the moment, gets a legendary skin? or like all of the kda skinline was popular champs, it’s pretty sad though, being an asol main I feel ur pain of having an overlooked champ in terms of skins, although I got mecha, it was disappointing after such a long wait and the excitement of hearing of a new skin in early 2018.
If a champion is played in the lower percentile, a new skin isn't gonna change that. That's just a waste of development effort on something that won't get purchases.
I await the day Ivern gets a skin. I mean how can a champion with the same letters as Riven NOT get as many skins? Like come on RIOT!
At least he is rumored to be getting another skin at some time. Poor Rek'Sai got 2 skins and nobody even remembers her.
